comment.author: 60783072@N02
comment._content: The fountain is called "Fuente Monumental Las Nereidas" (The Nereids Monumental Fountain), and still lies in Costanera Sur Reserve, in the district of Puerto Madero.

comment.author: 22164282@N04
comment._content: Lola Mora was the artist who made this sculpture in 1903. Her full name was Dolores Candelaria Mora Vega.
